String.string: Infuse the item to obtain Simple Refreshing Undergarments.
Convert for a chance at [Meruma's Silk Underwear].
Combine this item to obtain [Event] Kurat's Ash Undergarments Box.
Combine to obtain a rare or a superior basic innerwear.
Converting the same item will not necessarily give the same result.
Use egg dyes to get colored eggs.
Able to use all {0} items as materials. However, except for event items.
Can obtain an [Uncommon Veteran's Innerwear] or a [Rare Veteran's Innerwear] by combining.
Can obtain a [Rare Veteran's Innerwear] or a [Veteran Genya's Innerwear] by combining.
Can obtain a [Veteran Genya's Innerwear] or a [Veteran Signature Innerwear] by combining.
Can obtain a [Veteran Signature Innerwear] by combining.
Combine four pieces of superior foot armor (Annihilation or Dark Light gear) to obtain a Double Option Foot Armor Box.
Select four pieces of superior foot armor with 2 or fewer options.
Combine four pieces of superior body armor (Annihilation or Dark Light gear) to obtain a Double Option Body Armor Box.
Select four pieces of superior body armor with 2 or fewer options.
Combine four pieces of superior hand armor (Annihilation or Dark Light gear) to obtain a Double Option Hand Armor Box.
Select four pieces of superior hand armor with 2 or fewer options.
Infuse 5 Warlord’s Rings to create 1 Option Change Scroll [Ring].
Infuse 5 Warlord’s Necklaces to create 1 Option Change Scroll [Necklace].
Infuse 5 Warlord’s Earrings to create 1 Option Change Scroll [Earrings].
Infuse 5 Warlord’s Circlets to create 1 Option Change Scroll [Circlet].
Collect Dungeon Tokens and Hunter's Tokens to create a Special Mission Missive.
Fill all available slots to combine items.
Combine 5 silexes and receive Battle Points.
Combine 5 normal dishes and receive Battle Points.
Combine 5 fish buffets and receive Battle Points.
Refining allows you to obtain an Option Change Scroll for the same part as the item.
Only items of the same equipment slot can be added.
Combine items to obtain a random option item of the same type.
Can only combine items of the same type.
Rune items can be obtained from Fusion.
Fuse to receive the Riding Skill: Chimeric Frostshadow Tiger.
